import React, { useState } from 'react'; function Testimonial() { const [reviews, setReviews] = useState([ { name: "John Doe", location: "123 Street, Chennai, India", review: "We are a passionate team committed to providing innovative solutions to our clients.", image: "assets/img/testimonial-1.jpg", video: "", rating: 5, }, { name: "Jane Smith", location: "456 Avenue, Bangalore, India", review: "Amazing experience! The tour was well planned and enjoyable.", image: "assets/img/testimonial-2.jpg", video: "", rating: 4, }, ]); const [newReview, setNewReview] = useState({ name: "", location: "", review: "", image: "", video: "", rating: 5, }); const handleReviewSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setReviews([...reviews, newReview]); setNewReview({ name: "", location: "", review: "", image: "", video: "", rating: 5 }); }; return (
